item.title: [Class suggestion] Devil and minion
item.dc:creator: NOBLE1
item.description:
The Devil

NK

Win condition: The Reaper has failed you. The Devil decides to go up there and murder everyone himself. Kill all members of the main factions to win

Passive 1;
Pure evil - death immune and occu immune

Passive 2;
Back from Hell - if you die then you will consume your living minion’s soul if you have one but the day you are revived all of your abilities are disabled for a day

Day Ability 1;
Deep cut - make a player bleed. The player will bleed like normal but it will take 1 day to kill them and not 2. {2 uses}

Day Ability 2;
A New Face - Take a body from Hell allowing you to transform into any role for the night coming up and the next morning. Can not become a unique class. If you are attacked when you are a class that doesn’t have death immunity than you will die and appear the class you have chosen

Ex. Picks Butler to become. The next morning he will be able to poison king and that night he will be able to occu someone. If you are checked the night you do this then your will appear as the faction you’ve picked that night{1 use}.

Night Ability 1;
Satin’s left hand - convert a non unique class into a Neutral Minion. {1 use} {if fails you will NOT lose your use}

Night Ability 2;
Depths of Hell - catch a player on fire this night burning them alive. (Unlimited use)

The Minion

Neutral

Win condition; Have the Devil win at all cost

Passive 1;
Evil runs in the family BLUE;You will know who The Devil is and what he does at night

Day Ability 1;
low learner - make a player bleed, but it will take 3 days for them to bleed to death instead of 2. (The message to the player will say that you have 2 days to live like normal) {3uses}

Night ability 1;
Strait to Hell - You send the player that The Devil killed tonight strait to Hell. Making it so nobody will know what the players class was and you also steal their log, making it so you can read it when ever you want (1 use)

Night ability 2;
taking the blame - when you use this Ability than you will go and murder the player instead of the Devil. (The Devil will know when you do this action){2 uses}
